channel.title: Topics on Yawar's website
channel.description: Recent content in Topics on Yawar's website

item.title: Good habits and Technology
item.description: In December 2021, Miki and I discuss his journey to developing good habits and his passion for new technologies in general and artificial intelligence in particular in this video.

item.title: Entrepreneurship
item.description: In August 2021, after three hours of hiking, Emile and I discuss his journey to entrepreneurship at a beautiful spot on the Italian-Swiss border in the Alps.
